meta.title: Operation of Microscope with Camera Attachment

sections.purpose: To capture digital images and videos of microscopic fields for documentation and teaching.
sections.scope: Applicable to imaging applications in Microbiology.
procedure: Turn ON the microscope light source and adjust illumination.
Switch ON the camera and open the imaging software on the computer.
Focus the specimen through the eyepieces first.
Adjust camera focus, exposure, and white balance via software.
Capture images or videos and save using appropriate file naming conventions.
After imaging, switch OFF the camera and microscope.
Cover the microscope and store properly.
precautions: Avoid abrupt cable pulling or bending.
Do not expose the camera sensor to intense direct light when not imaging.
Use only recommended cleaning agents for optics.
Protect electronic components from liquid spills.
